description: This letter should accompany an estimate that requires a design fee.
name: Estimate Cover Letter (with design fee)

description: This letter should accompany an estimate that does not require a design fee.
name: Estimate Cover Letter (without design fee)

description: This letter is to be sent as a followup after an estimate has been delivered, but not responded to. Typically this letter should be sent one week after the estimate has been delivered.
name: Estimate Follow-up Letter

description: This letter is designed as a first contact with a potential builder client.
name: Introductory Letter-Builder

description: This letter should accompany a net terms Proposal.
name: Proposal Cover Letter (2 or 3 payment terms)

description: This letter should accompany a net terms Proposal.
name: Proposal Cover Letter (net terms)

description: This letter is to be sent as a followup after a proposal with 2 or 3 payment terms has been delivered, but not responded to.
name: Proposal Follow-up Letter (2 or 3 payment terms)

description: This letter is to be sent as a followup after a proposal with net terms has been delivered, but not responded to.
name: Proposal Follow-up Letter (net terms)
